content: **grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** the premium version includes a stitch diagram make the continuance afghan square with medium weight yarn and a 5 5 mm hook this 12 x 12-inch square has a lovely texture that s perfect for blankets pillows or afghans you can keep it small or repeat the pattern to make it as big as you like it looks great in any yarn ombre variegated or solid > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop the premium version includes a stitch diagram bamcal december 2024 pattern ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
